https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1dW2o6tOo1nNGxpckxOYJbQS2ou.jpg Addison Madeira is a nine year old boy coping with a terrible trauma. Refusing to speak and estranged from his mother, he creates a world of his own, hidden behind a blanket hanging from his bedroom wall. Addison's Wall
